title: Skill Scheduler
description: A productivity-focused full-stack web application designed to help students manage their study routines efficiently. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB, it allows users to create personalized schedules, set goals, manage tasks and exams, track progress, store categorized notes, and generate subject-wise quizzes.

title: NST Static Website
description: A responsive static website built with HTML and CSS, showcasing clean layout design and user-friendly interface. Ideal for beginner-level web projects or static landing pages.

title: Shyara Gold Admin Panel
description: An admin panel system built with MERN stack to manage store owners and track store performance. Features include role-based access control (RBAC) for Super Admins and Store Managers, store listing, owner management, and secure authentication.

title: CampusEvents Pro â€“ Event & Finance Management Platform
description: A college-focused event management platform built with the MERN stack to manage events end-to-end. Features include event creation and lifecycle management, participant registrations, hackathon team formation, role-based access control (RBAC), integrated budgeting and expense approval workflows, automated certificate generation, and downloadable financial reports.
